level.text: Emergency procurement awards, regardless of dollar value, shall be published in accordance with the provisions in ยง 1305 of this chapter.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 4665 (May 27, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 8383 (September 30, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 9514, 9517 (November 11, 2011).
